item.title: Code art in Python - Spirograph pattern in a rectangle - Part 2
item.description: 1. Introduction This post belongs to the code art series, where art is built with code. The previous post and this one will aim at defining a function to create a geometric pattern, a spirograph pattern in a rectangle, inspired by this video, with Python libraries. We will follow these steps: Grid definition, parametric equation of the rectangle in Part1. Polygon vertex detection, postprocessing of intersection points, colour scheme definition, global function implementation and final drawings in Part2.
